channel.title: Virtualization on JWillikers
channel.description: Recent content in Virtualization on JWillikers

item.title: Backup Docker Data
item.description: Backups are super helpful, especially when you like to blow everything away fairly often. Backing up the data from a Docker container can help you quickly get things up and running again. Tutorial My recent post detailed how to setup a UniFi Controller in a Docker container. This tutorial uses that container as an example for creating and restoring backups of data volumes. Backup Creating backups is done by producing an archive of the important files on the host filesystem from the container’s data volume.
